title: Erotic Stories of Domination and Submission: Taking Jennifer
description: A graphic erotic short story (8300 words) of domination and submission.He was taking her to the gallery, he’d said, to the Picasso exhibit. But when he picked her up, he took her first to his apartment to wait while he finished some work. Jennifer promised she’d wait quietly, but she wanted him, and she couldn’t help reaching for him… “This is completely unacceptable, darling. You’re tempting me and distracting me, and I’ve got pressing business, as I told you.” She pouted, pursing her full lips and canting her head to the side. “That’s only making it worse!” “I can’t help it, Sir. I just...” “This will not do. You’ll need to learn to control yourself. I’ll have to train you if you can’t.” Before he takes her to the gallery, then, he will take her somewhere deep inside herself, into her submission, into her surrender—and then he will take her for himself.
author: James   Wood
